amendatorysection.catchline: State assistance to political subdivision; commission; approval of application; quorum.
amendatorysection.para: (1) After consideration of the application and the evidence, the commission shall issue a finding of whether the use described in the application is eligible for state assistance.
(2) If the commission finds that the use described in the application is a legitimate use and that state assistance is in the best interest of the state, the application shall be approved.
(3) A majority of the commission members constitutes a quorum for the purpose of conducting business. All actions of the commission shall be made by a majority vote of the voting members.
